name: After Guardian Angel
description:
Ren is a death god who has to take the soul of Ai, who has less than a week to live.

Will he be able to send her properly to the afterlife or...?

This is the first Kinetic Novel I made last 2014.
I'm having second thoughts if I should remake this one. I can't find my old project.

I can't find where I put the old sprites lmao
It was my first time drawing for my VN's so it's kinda crappy. I'm sorry ;w;

This one is written in ENGLISH.

Old forum thread: https://lemmasoft.renai.us/forums/viewtopic.php?f=...

FEW REMINDERS:
🌸 There's an error with the extra menu. You might get trapped in the game if you play it for another round, after opening reading the extras. Just avoid playing it again, after clicking the extra room.
🌸 There are typos and grammar errors. I replayed this, after 2 years orz.
🌸 I'm bothered since I didn't do a good job crediting my sources for this game.
🌸 I'm also bothered with the typos and grammar lmao

I'm so sorry about this and thank you very much!
